file_content.text: Welcome, conqueror of Corellia. The title suits you well. Wear it with honor.
Welcome, conquerors of Corellia. Wear that title with honor. You all have certainly earned it.
It was a pleasure to see your powers in action, my lord.
Impressive blaster work. You must have ice running through those veins.
Impressive display, hunter. We could learn a thing or two from your tactics.
The Green Jedi will fear you now--as will Master Ramos. Impressive work.
I'm here on strict orders. We're to secure the courtyards and guard your rear.
Good to know the Imperial Guard's watching my back.
Thank you.
Wish we could see you further. Give Master Ramos my regards.
The dark side is the only backup I need to destroy these Jedi.
Spare me your heroics.
Block my aim again, and I won't hold my fire.
Next time, back off.
We go where the Emperor commands. Now that you're safe, we can keep our distance.
Back to it, men! Leave no Jedi alive!
You're dismissed, General.
You heard the man. Start moving. Hunt down every last Jedi!
You heard the lady. Move out. Down every Jedi you see!
The Green Jedi's enclave is under siege. I'll join the attack soon.
Darth Decimus awaits your help in Capitol Square.
I've killed the unkillable Jedi. Axial Park belongs to the Empire.
One absurd rumor of an invincible Jedi safely put to rest.
And I hear you destroyed the Republic monuments. Patriotism deserves recognition.
Your powers are only rivaled by the Dark Council itself. It's been an honor, my lord.
You set an impressive example for Imperials everywhere. It's been a privilege.
You're the first mercenary the Imperial Guard could learn from. It's been a pleasure.
Few match the Imperial Guard in lethality, but you've surpassed us. It's been an honor.
I only wish all servants of the Emperor were so capable.
Likewise, General.
You're right to admire me.
That is why the Empire still requires your talents.
My pay better match my praise.
Of course, hunter. I hope this doesn't conclude your business with the Empire.
Corellia still needs me.
Darth Decimus is personally overseeing our final battle on Corellia. He's requested an audience with you in person. A great honor.
You'll find him in Capitol Square--the heart of Corellia's power structure. Assist the Dark Lord and secure this planet for the Empire.
Axial Park won't be ours while General Corin Tok still breathes.
Contact Lieutenant Roval in our outpost. We'll coordinate your final assault from there.
Just received a distress signal--our outpost is under attack! Hurry and assist!
Good work. Now let's use their signals against them.
Get close to the Republic walkers and set off the flares. Our squadrons will spy the signal and blow the targets away.
The Republic's launching a major assault. Kill the commandos leading it, then grab their emergency flares so they can't call in backup.
The Republic's moving to flank us. Cut them down!
Time to hit back. Fight your way into Coronet Zoo. Destroy the Republic's artillery.
Leave the emplacements for now. Republic troops are crawling behind our lines. Stomp them out!
The battle awaits.
You honor me again, my lord. Welcome to Axial Park. Our battle needs your presence, and your lightsaber.
Good to see you again, sir. Welcome to Axial Park. Our battle has escalated.
Perfect timing, hunter. Our battle in Axial Park is heating up.
Ah, we meet again. And just when our battle in Axial Park starts boiling.
This used to be the most beautiful parkland in all Republic space. Of course, our fight's changed the landscape considerably. Darth Decimus will brief you on the specifics.
Impressive work choking off the Selonians. This fight, however, will demand the full scope of your passion, strength and power.
Excellent work securing the Selonian tunnels. But to win here, you'll need every trick of Intelligence.
Excellent job stomping out the Selonians, hunter. Win this fight, and you'll more than earn your pay.
Thanks to you, the rebellion in Labor Valley lies in ruin. But the next fight will not be so easy.
The Republic is going all out to hold Axial Park. They know that control over Corellia hangs in the balance.
The park's crawling with shock troops, battle droids and special forces--all lead by one very dangerous Jedi. We've never faced such a massive Republic deployment.
The Republic's entire army is no match for the dark side.
It won't be enough.
You won't have to rely on the Force alone, my lord. We have bomber squadrons, special ops and walkers in the field.
Republic numbers are no match for Imperial strategy. I trust we're responding in kind.
It won't be enough.
Correct, sir. We have artillery, specials ops and walkers on the ground. Bombers in the sky.
Match the Republic, blaster for blaster. Make them flinch.
They can't hold out forever.
They're already on the defensive. We've moved in special ops, walkers and artillery. Rocket trams deliver more every minute.
How is the Empire retaliating?
What's our response?
We've blocked off side streets, forcing the Republic into open warfare. On the ground, we have artillery, special ops, walkers--every ingredient for victory.
But this battle demands more. Corellia won't be ours while the rebels still stand.
I'll kill them all.
They deserve punishment, but you won't be the only one meting it out.
We're hammering the Republic with blaster cannons, special ops and walkers. Rocket trams deliver more reinforcements every minute.
We must crush their army here--break the Republic, and take Axial Park. Then we're primed to strike at the rebellion's heart.
General Hesker, tell your men to follow my command. We're going to crush the Republic army.
I will lead the attack.
Excellent. But you'll have more than Imperial forces nipping at your heels. You remember the corrupt Corellian councillor, Darbin Sull.
I'll check out Axial Park, but no promises.
Let me see what I can do.
While you're sightseeing, you'll have company. You remember the corrupt Corellian councillor, Darbin Sull.
Are these restraints really necessary?
Darbin is now your prisoner. He will join your foray into Axial Park, and you will deliver him to the Republic.
Hear that, Darbin? We're marching into battle. I hope you're ready.
This should be interesting.
Just don't move too fast. These bindings are giving me blisters.
Slow me down and I'll kill you myself.
Keep up, or you're dead.
Don't worry. I used to jog in Axial Park all the time.
As tempting as it is, don't kill him. We need Darbin to help us infiltrate the Republic.
My prisoner?
The councillor is helping us to infiltrate the Republic.
Take him into battle as your captive, then "lose" him. Darbin should remember the rest.
Like my mother's face. I charm my way into the Republic. Once you win Axial Park, I help bring them down from the inside.
Precisely. Unleash Darbin, conquer Axial Park and you'll plant the seed for our final victory. Hold nothing back.
Look at Darbin. The fresh face, cheerful spirit--not damaged enough to be an Imperial prisoner....
Hold still, Darbin. I wouldn't want to blind you.
Good point. [Hit Darbin]
Wait--you can't be serious...!
Much better. When the Republic questions your loyalty, show them your bruises.
He should save his strength for the battlefield.
He'll be fine.
That's right. Besides, I don't need bruises to trick the Republic.
You're lucky, Darbin, but not invincible. Don't forget that.
You deliver this rodent, and I'll direct your strikes against the Republic Army itself. Good luck.
Corellia is nearly ours. Turn away, and you surrender everything.
The Republic is rolling out their best armaments in Axial Park.
Well... that was exhilarating.
I've never fired one of these things before. Maybe I'll get some practice in on my way to the Republic.
The Empire is your master. Don't forget that.
Remember who you serve.
No need to worry. The Republic's on its way out, and I don't ally with losers.
Keep your head down. Try not to blast your face off.
Good luck.
Thanks for the concern. I won't stick around any longer than I have to.
Point taken. I'm good to go.
General--Darbin's armed and ready.
What are you waiting for, Councilor? Get out there.
Farewell. When this is over and I'm prime minister, I won't forget you!
Farewell. I'll remember you all when I become prime minister!
Finally. Now to the battle at hand.
Our gun batteries are under assault. Drive off the Republic forces. Once the guns are safe, I'll have additional intel and orders.
Time to shut up and move.
Let the battle begin!
